#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

vector<int> d;
int ans, n;

int main() {
    cin.sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin>>n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        long long x;
        cin>>x;
        vector<int>::iterator it = upper_bound(d.begin(), d.end(), x);
        if (it == d.end()) d.push_back(x);
        else *it = x;
    }
    cout<<d.size()<<endl;
    return 0;
}
